Package ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database

Class ProfileImageHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database.images.BaseImageHandler
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database.images.ProfileImageHandler
public class ProfileImageHandler extends BaseImageHandler
The ProfileImageHandler class is responsible for handling profile image-related operations such as uploading, retrieving, and removing profile images.

  • Method Details

    • uploadProfilePicture

      public void uploadProfilePicture(android.net.Uri file, Profile profile)
      Uploads the profile picture to the Firebase Storage and updates the profile with the new picture ID.
      Parameters:
      file - The Uri of the image file to upload.
      profile - The profile to assign the profile picture to.

    • getProfilePicture

      public void getProfilePicture(Profile profile, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Retrieves and sets the profile picture of a profile into an ImageView.
      Parameters:
      profile - The profile whose profile picture is to be retrieved.
      imageView - The ImageView to set the profile picture into.

    • removeProfilePic

      public void removeProfilePic(Profile profile)
      Removes the profile picture of a given profile.
      Parameters:
      profile - The profile whose profile picture will be removed.
